quote: A thing constructed can only be loved after it is constructed; but a thing created is loved before it exists. – Charles Dickens
fact: Steely Dan got their name from a sexual device depicted in the book `The Naked Lunch`.
joke: Did you know the first French fries weren't actually cooked in France? They were cooked in Greece.
